00001 /* MDDRIVER.C - test driver for MD2, MD4 and MD5
00002  */
00003 
00004 /* Copyright (C) 1990-2, RSA Data Security, Inc. Created 1990. All
00005 rights reserved.
00006

00008 the merchantability of this software or the suitability of this

00010 without express or implied warranty of any kind.

00016 /* The following makes MD default to MD5 if it has not already been
00017   defined with C compiler flags.
00018  */
00019 #ifndef MD
00020 #define MD 5
00021 #endif
00022 
00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 #include <time.h>
00025 #include <string.h>
00026 #include "global.h"
00027 #if MD == 2
00028 #include "md2.h"
00029 #endif
00030 #if MD == 4
00031 #include "md4.h"
00032 #endif
00033 #if MD == 5
00034 #include "md5.h"
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 /* Length of test block, number of test blocks.
00038  */
00039 #define TEST_BLOCK_LEN 1000
00040 #define TEST_BLOCK_COUNT 1000
00041 
00042 static void MDString PROTO_LIST ((char *));
00043 static void MDTimeTrial PROTO_LIST ((void));
00044 static void MDTestSuite PROTO_LIST ((void));
00045 static void MDFile PROTO_LIST ((char *));
00046 static void MDFilter PROTO_LIST ((void));
00047 static void MDPrint PROTO_LIST ((unsigned char [16]));
00048 
00049 #if MD == 2
00050 #define MD5_CTX MD2_CTX
00051 #define MDInit MD2Init
00052 #define MDUpdate MD2Update
00053 #define MDFinal MD2Final
00054 #endif
00055 #if MD == 4
00056 #define MD5_CTX MD4_CTX
00057 #define MDInit MD4Init
00058 #define MDUpdate MD4Update
00059 #define MDFinal MD4Final
00060 #endif
00061 #if MD == 5
00062 #define MD5_CTX MD5_CTX
00063 #define MDInit MD5Init
00064 #define MDUpdate MD5Update
00065 #define MDFinal MD5Final
00066 #endif
00067 
00068 /* Main driver.
00069 
00070 Arguments (may be any combination):
00071   -sstring - digests string
00072   -t       - runs time trial
00073   -x       - runs test script
00074   filename - digests file
00075   (none)   - digests standard input
00076  */
00077 int main (argc, argv)
00078 int argc;
00079 
00080 char *argv[];
00081 {
00082   int i;
00083 
00084   if (argc > 1)
00085  for (i = 1; i < argc; i++)
00086    if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 's')
00087      MDString (argv[i] + 2);
00088    else if (strcmp (argv[i], "-t") == 0)
00089      MDTimeTrial ();
00090    else if (strcmp (argv[i], "-x") == 0)
00091      MDTestSuite ();
00092    else
00093      MDFile (argv[i]);
00094   else
00095  MDFilter ();
00096 
00097   return (0);
00098 }
00099 
00100 /* Digests a string and prints the result.
00101  */
00102 static void MDString (string)
00103 char *string;
00104 {
00105   MD5_CTX context;
00106   unsigned char digest[16];
00107   unsigned int len = strlen (string);
00108 
00109   MDInit (&context);
00110   MDUpdate (&context, string, len);
00111   MDFinal (digest, &context);
00112 
00113   printf ("MD%d (\"%s\") = ", MD, string);
00114   MDPrint (digest);
00115   printf ("\n");
00116 }
00117 
00118 /* Measures the time to digest TEST_BLOCK_COUNT TEST_BLOCK_LEN-byte
00119   blocks.
00120  */
00121 static void MDTimeTrial ()
00122 {
00123   MD5_CTX context;
00124   time_t endTime, startTime;
00125   unsigned char block[TEST_BLOCK_LEN], digest[16];
00126   unsigned int i;
00127 
00128 
00129   printf
00130  ("MD%d time trial. Digesting %d %d-byte blocks ...", MD,
00131   TEST_BLOCK_LEN, TEST_BLOCK_COUNT);
00132 
00133   /* Initialize block */
00134   for (i = 0; i < TEST_BLOCK_LEN; i++)
00135  block[i] = (unsigned char)(i & 0xff);
00136 
00137   /* Start timer */
00138   time (&startTime);
00139 
00140   /* Digest blocks */
00141   MDInit (&context);
00142   for (i = 0; i < TEST_BLOCK_COUNT; i++)
00143  MDUpdate (&context, block, TEST_BLOCK_LEN);
00144   MDFinal (digest, &context);
00145 
00146   /* Stop timer */
00147   time (&endTime);
00148 
00149   printf (" done\n");
00150   printf ("Digest = ");
00151   MDPrint (digest);
00152   printf ("\nTime = %ld seconds\n", (long)(endTime-startTime));
00153   printf
00154  ("Speed = %ld bytes/second\n",
00155   (long)TEST_BLOCK_LEN * (long)TEST_BLOCK_COUNT/(endTime-startTime));
00156 }
00157 
00158 /* Digests a reference suite of strings and prints the results.
00159  */
00160 static void MDTestSuite ()
00161 {
00162   printf ("MD%d test suite:\n", MD);
00163 
00164   MDString ("");
00165   MDString ("a");
00166   MDString ("abc");
00167   MDString ("message digest");
00168   MDString ("abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz");
00169   MDString
00170  ("ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789");
00171   MDString
00172  ("1234567890123456789012345678901234567890\
00173 1234567890123456789012345678901234567890");
00174 }
00175 
00176 /* Digests a file and prints the result.
00177  */
00178 static void MDFile (filename)
00179 char *filename;
00180 {
00181   FILE *file;
00182   MD5_CTX context;
00183   int len;
00184   unsigned char buffer[1024], digest[16];
00185 
00186   if ((file = fopen (filename, "rb")) == NULL)
00187  printf ("%s can't be opened\n", filename);
00188 
00189   else {
00190  MDInit (&context);
00191  while (len = fread (buffer, 1, 1024, file))
00192    MDUpdate (&context, buffer, len);
00193  MDFinal (digest, &context);
00194 
00195  fclose (file);
00196 
00197  printf ("MD%d (%s) = ", MD, filename);
00198  MDPrint (digest);
00199  printf ("\n");
00200   }
00201 }
00202 
00203 /* Digests the standard input and prints the result.
00204  */
00205 static void MDFilter ()
00206 {
00207   MD5_CTX context;
00208   int len;
00209   unsigned char buffer[16], digest[16];
00210 
00211   MDInit (&context);
00212   while (len = fread (buffer, 1, 16, stdin))
00213  MDUpdate (&context, buffer, len);
00214   MDFinal (digest, &context);
00215 
00216   MDPrint (digest);
00217   printf ("\n");
00218 }
00219 
00220 /* Prints a message digest in hexadecimal.
00221  */
00222 static void MDPrint (digest)
00223 unsigned char digest[16];
00224 {
00225 
00226   unsigned int i;
00227 
00228   for (i = 0; i < 16; i++)
00229  printf ("%02x", digest[i]);
00230 }
